entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Clean up our System.Text.Json references #39902
  • dotnet-format: Different formatting of C# 12 collection expressions depending on SDK version #39898
  • CA2022 error in RazorSdk tool source #39893
  • [ApiCompat] Include description in generated suppression file output #39892
  • Cannot uninstall ANY workload if any unsigned/development workloads are currently installed. #39890

Closed

  • [Feature Request]: Support reference aliases in implicit usings #39889

PullRequests

Created

  • Pin to 8.0.0 in framework builds for two components loading in VS #39901
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the compiling version to the latest MSBuild from that band to fix scanner issues #39896
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add workload config command #39888
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2417913 #39828
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Ingest new props file from installer and use it to auto-include Toolset Compilers package #39701
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39830
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the msbuild version to a version that includes additional fixes #39641
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `http` prefix when docker config detect a insecure registry #39840
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
